title: [Cheshire] CLC討論區(12) 車傻仔入學式

replies.msg:
歡迎黎到CLC(CrystaL Clear)討論區！









「CLC」（씨엘씨）出道於2015年3月19日，初始成員5人(吳承姬、崔有真、張丞延、Sorn和張睿恩)，2016年2月加入新成員ELKIE(莊錠欣)及權恩彬。團名「CLC」為「CrystaL Clear」之縮寫，期許成員們能像水晶一樣永遠保持在潔淨、閃耀的模樣。CLC的粉絲為"Cheshire(쳇셔)"，因為CLC和Logo中貓咪樣式很相配與愛麗絲夢遊仙境裡面的Cheshire貓咪一樣都是一直微笑著的，而Cheshire亦有著Crystal的意思。CLC是繼2009年4minute之後，Cube娛樂相隔六年推出的女子團體，作為備受期待的Cube新人，被網友以「Cube Girls」稱呼，但實際上她們早就以「CLC」之名在弘大街頭多次進行表演，累積演出經驗之外也將街頭表演收入作幫助殘障兒童之用途。


CLC曾與B1A4及GOT7一起拍攝廣告，吳承姬參與師兄BEAST成員梁耀燮歌曲之featuring，所有成員也出演師姐G.NA的音樂錄影帶並參與該曲的舞台伴舞，吳承姬個人並出演師兄團BTOB的音樂錄影帶，而Sorn更加是「tvN K-POP獵星行動第一季」的優勝者，成員們於出道前就進行了相當多樣的活動。

成員簡介：


韓文名：오승희

國籍：南韓

身高：163 CM

具備水準級的鋼琴演奏實力，也能作曲、作詞等，有成為製作人的潛能

(Curious About You)》

2016年出演JTBC新女團主唱競演節目《Girl Spirit》。

Hey guys, what are all of you doing? Yesterday we went to this restaurant place and the vibe there was really good. Its been awhile since all of our members ate outside together. We all took a bunch of pictures and ate really tasty food. IT WAS REALLY GOOD NO KIDDING. 

Anyways just wanted to stop by and say hi to you all, and was just wondering what all of you are doing. Now that ProduSorn is over, I'm on my break to think of more contents for Season 2 and reflecting on the improvements I could make to make Season more entertaining. 

What are you all doing these days? I wanted to draw some pictures but my head is totally blank. I wanted to go tour around the city but I have no idea where to go. I wanted to watch a movie but I have NO IDEA whats hot these days. OOOH and books! You guys have any interesting books you guys wants to suggest me to read? I could really need you guys help and suggestions. I Even drama... what do you all watch? Any suggestions? I recently watched "13 Reasons Why" & "Abstract" on Netflix, I think you all should go check it out! 

These days theres alot of roses blossoming everywhere so I decided to take a picture with one near our dorm because it was soooo pretty and also I wanted to show it to my mom since she really likes roses too. AND YOU GUYS ALL KNOW HOW MUCH I LOVE FLOWERS 🌺 

ANYWAYS, I hope you guys have a good day! Tell me whats going on in your life peeps 💕
LOVE YOU AND MISS YOU ALL 😘
